# Community Residential Facilities (CRFs) Tender Announcement

## Overview

The Correctional Service of Canada (CSC) invites interested suppliers to submit a statement of capabilities for the provision of community residential facilities (CRFs) in the Atlantic Region. This tender is subject to the Governments of Canada's Procurement Agreement.

## Background

The CSC is responsible for supervising offenders under federal jurisdiction on conditional release in the community until the end of their sentences and offenders subject to Long-Term Supervision Orders. CRFs provide a bridge between the institution and the community, ensuring suitable accommodation, support systems, and monitoring are in place to assist conditionally released offenders to reintegrate into society.

## Statement of Work

The contract includes the following services:

* Twenty-four (24) hour residential services to adult offenders
* Accommodation, monitoring, general support, and assistance to offenders under federal jurisdiction
* Providing beds to offenders, three meals a day, and developing a Resident Action Plan
* Assisting offenders in crisis management, personal or family problems, education, literacy, employment, and budgeting
* Providing static and dynamic security services, including staff on-site and awake 24 hours a day

## Required Skills and Experience

* Minimum 2 years of experience in working with adult offenders on conditional release
* Minimum 2 years of experience in providing accommodation to offenders in a residential setting

## Evaluation Criteria

* Ability to meet the minimum essential requirements
* Demonstrated experience in providing community residential services
* Compliance with all applicable legislation and CSC's rules and regulations

## Procurement Method

This procurement is not subject to any trade agreement. The contract will be awarded to a pre-identified supplier with a strong track record of providing community residential services.

## Contact Information

For inquiries and submissions, please contact:

Mbinwi Ghogomu
Correspondence address: 340 Laurier Avenue West, Ottawa, ON K1A 0P9
Telephone: 343-549-7179
Email: [mbinwi.ghogomu@csc-scc.gc.ca](mailto:mbinwi.ghogomu@csc-scc.gc.ca)

## Tender Closing Date

January 9th, 2024 at 2:00 p.m. EST

**Note**: This tender is for the provision of community residential facilities in the Atlantic Region. The CSC is seeking a supplier with a strong track record of providing residential services to adult offenders.
